Html: Is it possible to create stand alone applications that make use of Goblin XNA? For example, a zip file that contains an exe of my application plus the dll files required to run? I know it requires OpenCV and other installed applications but I'm wondering that if I simply have the proper libraries where they want to be if I could create a more portable version of my application?

Yes. 

Goblin XNA itself requires:
1. XNA 3.1 redistributable (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=53867a2a-e249-4560-8011-98eb3e799ef2&displaylang=en)
2. .NET 3.5 framework (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=333325fd-ae52-4e35-b531-508d977d32a6&DisplayLang=en)

OpenCV installation requirement is specific to ALVAR implementation. 

Other than that, you simply need:
1. All of the necessary DLLs
2. .exe file
3. Contents compiled by XNA (e.g., .xnb files)
